resources.string: Please confirm your country code and enter your phone number.
We\'ve sent an SMS with an activation code to your phone
Set up your first and last name
Start messaging by pressing the\nnew message button in the bottom right corner\nor tap the menu button for more options.

%1$s is using an older version of Telegram, so secret photos will be shown in compatibility mode.\n\nOnce %2$s updates Telegram, photos with timers for 1 minute or less will start working in \'Tap and hold to view\' mode, and you will be notified whenever the other party takes a screenshot.
You can provide an optional description for your group.
You will lose all messages in this group.
You can add administrators to help you manage your group. Tap and hold to remove them.
Wait! Deleting this group will remove all members and all messages will be lost. Delete the group anyway?
un1 added you to this group
Are you sure you want to leave the group?
Sorry, you can\'t add this user to groups.
Sorry, this user decided to leave this group, so you cannot invite them back here.
Sorry, too many adminstrators in this group.
Sorry, too many bots in this group.
This group was upgraded to a supergroup
Blocked users are removed from the group and can only come back if invited by an admin. Invite links don\'t work for them.
If you enable comments, people will be able to discuss your posts in the channel.
People can share this link with others and find your channel using Telegram search.
People can join your channel by following this link. You can revoke the link any time.
You can provide an optional description for your channel.
Public channels can be found in search, anyone can join them.
Private channels can only be joined via an invite link.
Channels are a new tool for broadcasting your messages to large audiences.
Sorry, this name is already taken.
Channel names must have at least 5 characters.
The name must not exceed 32 characters.
Channel names can\'t start with a number.
Wait! Deleting this channel will remove all members and all messages will be lost. Delete the channel anyway?
Are you sure you want to leave the channel?
You will lose all messages in this channel.
Please note that if you choose a public link for your channel, anyone will be able to find it in search and join.\n\nDo not create this link if you want your channel to stay private.
Please choose a link for your public channel, so that people can find it in search and share with others.\n\nIf you\'re not interested, we suggest creating a private channel instead.
Sorry, you have created too many public channels. You can either create a private channel or delete one of your existing channels first.
Are you sure you want to make %1$s an administrator?
Only channel administrators can see this list.
This user hasn\'t joined the channel yet. Do you want to invite them?
Anyone who has Telegram installed will be able to join your channel by following this link.
You can add administrators to help you manage your channel. Tap and hold to remove admins.
Do you want to join the channel \'%1$s\'?
Sorry, this chat is no longer accessible.
Sorry, this user decided to leave this channel, so you cannot invite them back here.
Sorry, you can\'t add this user to channels.
Sorry, too many admins in this channel.
Sorry, too many bots in this channel.
Sorry, you can only add the first 200 members to a channel. Note that an unlimited number of people may join via the channel\'s link.
un1 added you to this channel
Sorry, you can\'t send messages to this channel.
%1$s sent a message to the channel %2$s
%1$s sent a photo to the channel %2$s
%1$s sent a video to the channel %2$s

%1$s sent a GIF to the channel %2$s
%1$s sent an audio to the channel %2$s
%1$s sent a sticker to the channel %2$s
Please add files to the music library on your device to see them here.
File size shouldn\'t be greater than %1$s
%s invited you to join a secret chat.
You have invited %s to join a secret chat.
Leave no trace on our servers
You were removed from this group
Are you sure you want to report spam from this user?
Are you sure you want to report spam from this group?
Sorry, you can only send messages to mutual contacts at the moment.
Sorry, you can only add mutual contacts to groups at the moment.
Tap here to access saved GIFs
You set the self-destruct timer to %1$s
%1$s sent a message to the group %2$s
%1$s sent a photo to the group %2$s

%1$s sent a sticker to the group %2$s

%1$s,
We detected a login into your account from a new device on %2$s

Device: %3$s
Location: %4$s

If this wasn't you, you can go to Settings - Privacy and Security - Sessions and terminate that session.

If you think that somebody logged in to your account against your will, you can enable two-step verification in Privacy and Security settings.

Sincerely,
The Telegram Team
%1$s joined to the group %2$s via invite link
Hey, let\'s switch to Talagram: http://goo.gl/jnmjnZ
last seen a long time ago
Do you want to join the chat \'%1$s\'?
Sorry, this group is already full.
Sorry, this chat does not seem to exist.
Are you sure you want to revoke this link? Once the link is revoked, no one will be able to join using it.
The previous invite link is now inactive. A new link has been generated.
Anyone who has Telegram installed will be able to join your group by following this link.
All members can add new members, edit name and photo of the group.
Only admins can add and remove members, edit name and photo of the group.
Please note that group members will need to update their Telegram apps to the latest version to see your supergroup. Are you sure you want to upgrade this group?

Members limit reached. To go over the limit and get additional features, upgrade to a supergroup: • Supergroups can get up to %1$s • New members see the entire chat history • Admins delete messages for everyone • Notifications are muted by default

This image is a visualization of the encryption key for this secret chat with %1$s.

If this image looks the same on %2$s\'s phone, your chat is 200%% secure.

Learn more at telegram.org
Sorry, this username is already taken.
A username must have at least 5 characters.
The username must not exceed 32 characters.
Sorry, a username can\'t start with a number.

You can choose a username on Talagram. If you do, other people will be able to find you by this username and contact you without knowing your phone number.

You can use a–z, 0–9 and underscores. Minimum length is 5 characters.
Artists are welcome to add their own sticker packs using our @stickers bot.\n\nUsers can add stickers by tapping on them and choosing \"Add to Stickers\".
Reset all notification settings to default
Tap and hold on user to unblock.
Undo all custom notification settings for all your contacts and groups

Please note that Telegram Support is done by volunteers. We try to respond as quickly as possible, but it may take a while.

Please take a look at the Telegram FAQ: it has answers to most questions and important tips for troubleshooting.

If Google Play Services are enough for you to receive notifications, you can disable Notifications Service. However we recommend you to leave it enabled to keep app running in background and receive instant notifications.

You can change your Telegram number here. Your account and all your cloud data — messages, media, contacts, etc. will be moved to the new number.\n\nImportant: all your Telegram contacts will get your new number added to their address book, provided they had your old number and you haven\'t blocked them in Telegram.
All your Telegram contacts will get your new number added to their address book, provided they had your old number and you haven\'t blocked them in Telegram.
We will send an SMS with a confirmation code to your new number.
The number %1$s is already connected to a Telegram account. Please delete that account before migrating to the new number.

Clearing the local database will delete the texts of cached messages and compress the database to save internal disk space. Telegram needs some data to work, so database size will not reach zero.\n\nThis operation can take a few minutes to complete.

Photos, videos and other files from cloud chats that you have not accessed during this period will be removed from this device to save disk space.\n\nAll media will stay in the Telegram cloud and can be re-downloaded if you need it again.
You can log in to Telegram from other mobile, tablet and desktop devices, using the same phone number. All your data will be instantly synchronized.
Control your sessions on other devices.
Tap on a session to terminate.

When you set up an additional passcode, a lock icon will appear on the chats page. Tap it to lock and unlock your Telegram app.\n\nNote: if you forget the passcode, you\'ll need to delete and reinstall the app. All secret chats will be lost.
You will now see a lock icon on the chats page. Tap it to lock your Telegram app with your new passcode.
Require passcode if away for a time.
Share photos and videos in this chat and access them on any of your devices.
Share music in this chat and access them on any of your devices.
Share files and documents in this chat and access them on any of your devices.
Share links in this chat and access them on any of your devices.
Are you sure you want to delete this photo?
Are you sure you want to delete this video?
You can set a password that will be required when you log in on a new device in addition to the code you get in the SMS.
Please add your valid e-mail. It is the only way to recover a forgotten password.
No, seriously.\n\nIf you forget your password, you will lose access to your Telegram account. There will be no way to restore it.
Please check your e-mail (don\'t forget the spam folder) to complete Two-Step Verification setup.
Your password for Two-Step Verification is now active.
Are you sure you want to disable your password?
Please create a hint for your password

Please follow these steps to complete Two-Step Verification Setup:

1. Check your e-mail (don't forget the spam folder)
%1$s

2. Click on the validation link.
Hint must be different from your password
Since you haven\'t provided a recovery e-mail when setting up your password, your remaining options are either to remember your password or to reset your account.
We have sent a recovery code to the e-mail you provided:\n\n%1$s
Please check your e-mail and enter the 6-digit code we have sent here.
If you can\'t restore access to your e-mail, your remaining options are either to remember your password or to reset your account.
You will lose all your chats and messages, along with any media and files you shared, if you proceed with resetting your account.
This action can not be undone.\n\nIf you reset your account, all your messages and chats will be deleted.
You have enabled Two-Step Verification, so your account is protected with an additional password.
You have enabled Two-Step verification.\nYou\'ll need the password you set up here to log in to your Telegram account.
Your recovery e-mail %1$s is not yet active and pending confirmation.
If you do not log in at least once within this period, your account will be deleted along with all groups, messages and contacts.
Change who can see your Last Seen time.
Who can see your Last Seen time?
Important: you won\'t be able to see Last Seen times for people with whom you don\'t share your Last Seen time. Approximate last seen will be shown instead (recently, within a week, within a month).
These settings will override the values above.
Sorry, too many requests. Unable to change privacy settings now, please wait.
Logs out all devices except for this one.
Tap and hold on user to delete.
You joined the group via invite link
un1 joined the group via invite link
un1 changed the group name to un2
You changed the group name to un2
This message is not supported on your version of Telegram. Update the app to view: https://telegram.org/update
Too many attempts, please try again later
Too many attempts, please try again in %1$s
You don\'t have a video player, please install one to continue
Please send an email to sms@stel.com and tell us about your problem.
You don\'t have applications that can handle the file type \'%1$s\', please install one to continue
This user does not have Telegram yet, send an invitation?
Number of last messages to forward:
This user is already in this group

Are you sure you want to log out?

Note that you can seamlessly use Telegram on all your devices at once.

Remember, logging out kills all your Secret Chats.

Are you sure you want to delete %1$s?
Sorry, this feature is currently not available in your country.
There is no Telegram account with this username.
Telegram needs access to your contacts so that you can connect with your friends across all your devices.
Telegram needs access to your storage so that you can send and save photos, videos, music and other media.
Telegram needs access to your microphone so that you can send voice messages.
Telegram needs access to your location so that you can share it with your friends.

The world\'s fastest messaging app.
It is free and secure.
And also themeable!

Talagram delivers messages faster than
any other application.

Talagram is free forever. No ads.
No subscription fees.

Talagram keeps your messages safe
from hacker attacks.

Talagram has no limits on the size of
your media and chats.

Talagram lets you access your messages
from multiple devices.

Talagram messages are heavily encrypted
and can self-destruct.

Talagram for Android has been updated. New in version 3.4.0:

GIF revolution: up to 20x faster downloading/sending, autoplay, save GIFs to a dedicated tab on the sticker panel.

More about GIFs:
https://telegram.org/blog/gif-revolution

Inline bots: A new way to add bot content to any chat. Type a bot's username and your query in the text field to get instant results and send them to your chat partner. Try typing “@gif dog” in your next chat. Sample bots: @gif, @wiki, @bing, @vid, @bold.

More about inline bots:
https://telegram.org/blog/inline-bots

New in version 3.4.2.5:

- Added 'Mark as read' for individual chats and 'Mark all as read' for every tab
- Added option in Plus settings to show username instead of mobile number in menu
- Bug fixes
Save your theme to Telegram/Themes folder
Theme not created yet. Apply any MOD first, please
Apply xml theme from local folder
Instead of just numbers files will be saved using name_date format
Would you like to check some themes created by other Talagram users?
Show contact avatar in chat screen
Show own avatar in chat screen
Show own avatar in group screen
"No Favorites\n\nTo add any chat to this list just tap and hold a chat and then click \'Add to favorites\'."
